title: PayPax
author: PayPax
content: Tether is the most popular stablecoin that pegs its value to fiat currencies such as USD. You can sell and buy Tether on PayPax or convert e-money to this stablecoin at any moment. To use PayPax for buying USDT with PayPal all you need to do is to create a user account in less than a minute. Share your experience if you have ever used paypax services
